name: Enhance reason for change
description: Module that allows some configuration for the built-in reason for change process

authors.name: Richard Hardy
authors.institution: University of Cambridge - Cambridge Cancer Trials Centre

system-settings.name: When checked, the text capacity in the reason for change free text box changes from 200 to 5000 characters
Provides a default option for the reason for change dropdown

project-settings.name: When checked, a dropdown of reasons for change will be available for the user to select from
Provide an option for the reason for change dropdown

When checked, any change to a field will highlight its row's right border. Direct changes are handled, as are indirect changes resulting from the 'mark field' dialogue or changes to a date time via a datetime picker
The style to apply to the highlight border e.g. solid 2px red (default), or dashed 4px blue. Invalid values will not display a border
